message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
